org.numenta.nupic.algorithms

Class MovingAverage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.numenta.nupic.algorithms.MovingAverage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Persistable

    public class MovingAverage
extends java.lang.Object
implements Persistable
    Helper class for computing moving average and sliding window
    Author:
    Numenta, David Ray
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • compute

        public static MovingAverage.Calculation compute(TDoubleList slidingWindow,
                                                double total,
                                                double newVal,
                                                int windowSize)
        Routine for computing a moving average
        Parameters:
        slidingWindow - a list of previous values to use in the computation that will be modified and returned
        total - total the sum of the values in the slidingWindow to be used in the calculation of the moving average
        newVal - newVal a new number to compute the new windowed average
        windowSize - windowSize how many values to use in the moving window
        Returns:

      • compute

        private static MovingAverage.Calculation compute(MovingAverage.Calculation calc,
                                                 TDoubleList slidingWindow,
                                                 double total,
                                                 double newVal,
                                                 int windowSize)
        Internal method which does actual calculation
        Parameters:
        calc - Re-used calculation object
        slidingWindow - a list of previous values to use in the computation that will be modified and returned
        total - total the sum of the values in the slidingWindow to be used in the calculation of the moving average
        newVal - newVal a new number to compute the new windowed average
        windowSize - windowSize how many values to use in the moving window
        Returns:
